5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jabir said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) went out on the Day of Al-Fitr or Al-Adha, and delivered a sermon standing up. Then he sat down briefly, then stood up again.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ فِي الْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the sermon for ‘Eid
